pro defparams readcol,'pblock.txt',var,num,format='A,F',delimiter=' ' for i=0,N_ELEMENTS(var)-1 do (SCOPE_VARFETCH(var[i],/enter,level=0))=num[i] c = CREATE_STRUCT(var[0],num[0]) ;This takes, like, no time. for i=1,N_ELEMENTS(var)-1 do begin c = CREATE_STRUCT(c,var[i],num[i]) endfor ; Load parameters from a txt file and make then system variables DEFSYSV,'!param',c END
